settings.redirect_text: You will be redirected to enter your payment details.

payment_statuses.account_verified: The account has been verified using a validation services like 0$ auth
payment_statuses.created: The transaction has been created. This is the initial state once a new payment is created.
payment_statuses.redirected: The consumer has been redirected to a 3rd party to complete the authentication/payment
payment_statuses.pending_payment: Instructions have been provided and we are now waiting for the money to come in
payment_statuses.pending_capture: The transaction is waiting for you to request one or more captures of the funds
payment_statuses.pending_fraud_approval: The transaction has been marked for manual review after an automatic fraud screening
payment_statuses.pending_approval: The transaction is awaiting approval to proceed with the capturing of the funds
payment_statuses.authorization_requested: We have requested an authorization against an asynchronous system and is awaiting its response
payment_statuses.capture_requested: The transaction is in the queue to be captured
payment_statuses.captured: The transaction has been captured and we have received online confirmation
payment_statuses.paid: We have matched the incoming funds to the transaction
payment_statuses.rejected_capture: We or one of our downstream acquirers/providers have rejected the capture request

refund_statuses.pending_approval: The transaction is awaiting approval from you to proceed with the processing of the refund
refund_statuses.refund_requested: The transaction is in the queue to be refunded
refund_statuses.captured: We have successfully refunded the consumer and has received an online confirmation from the third party
refund_statuses.refunded: We have successfully refunded the consumer
